message:
WOW, must read for software pirates ;)
// Seriously

RT @mattkocaj: What happens when pirates play a game development simulator and then go bankrupt because of piracy?

http://t.co/SEi2lBioQc 

#theirony #rrrrr
name: What happens when pirates play a game development simulator and then go bankrupt because of piracy?.
caption: www.greenheartgames.com
description: When we released our very first game, Game Dev Tycoon (for Mac, Windows and Linux) yesterday, we did something unusual and as far as I know unique. We released a cracked version of the game ourselves, minutes after opening our Store.
